mapper.insert: insert into t_tfs_accountdetail (accountcode, transorderid, tradetype, orgcode, productid, balancetype,creditamount,frozonamount, settleamount,status,remark,createtime) values ( #{accountCode}, #{transOrderId}, #{tradeType}, #{orgCode}, #{productId}, #{balanceType},#{creditAmount},#{frozonAmount},#{settleAmount},#{status}, #{remark},#{createTime})
